title: Because I’m the Number One Idol in the Universe!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Huff, huff...... Ugh~! This is so frustrating! Why can’t Nico do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>But Rin thinks she’s starting to get a good sense of it, nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Just getting a good sense of it isn’t enough. Nico has to remember all these steps at any cost!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>But, these steps are really difficult, nya......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You’ll get it eventually, Rin. But Nico has to become the master, no matter what!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Why do you like these steps? There are so many other kinds of steps that we could do.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Why? Because Nico, the number one in the universe, chose it, that’s why! Nico should be able to handle this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Nico-chan...... Got it! Leave it to Rin. Rin will keep practicing as many times as she needs!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Exactly! For the sake of her fans, Nico Nii will put on her most amazing performance yet! Rin, Nico will make you Nico’s special handmade ramen as a reward!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hooray!! Alright, Nico-chan! It’s time for special training, nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
